title: Data Science Intern
description: Designed and implemented scalable software solutions using Python and SQL. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure project deliverables met quality standards. Conducted debugging and performance optimization to enhance overall application efficiency.
achievements: Developed data pipelines to process and analyze large datasets efficiently.
Contributed to data visualization reports supporting business insights and decisions.

title: Python-ML Intern
description: Developed and deployed machine learning pipelines integrated into existing systems to improve automation and decision-making processes. Automated data preprocessing and transformation tasks using Python scripts to streamline workflows.
achievements: Built and optimized ML models for predictive analytics tasks.
Automated repetitive data processing workflows, reducing manual effort by 30%.
Collaborated with the team to integrate ML models into live applications.

title: AWS Academy AI-ML Virtual Intern
description: Gained hands-on experience in building, training, and deploying AI/ML models on AWS Cloud. Focused on enhancing application scalability and performance using cloud-native services and best practices in model deployment.
achievements: Deployed end-to-end ML models using AWS SageMaker.
Improved application scalability and reduced latency through cloud optimization.
Completed AWS Academy AI-ML certification demonstrating practical cloud expertise.
